channel.title: InnovationX source problem
channel.description:
Ok, so i downloaded InnovationX tried getting it to work, but NOOO it doesn't want to -.- b4 i explain whats going on i have a vista 32-bit computer.... so... whats going wrong is!!!
Fresh from the download, trying to run the source. ( I deleted mysql ) [IMG]http://i516.photobucket.com/albums/u322/cant_911/hfh.jpg[/img]
When i tried fixing the problem... by downloading a random jvm.dll from the internet [IMG]http://i516.photobucket.com/albums/u322/cant_911/Untitled.jpg[/img]
when i went on the thread and change the run.bat code [IMG]http://i516.photobucket.com/albums/u322/cant_911/fwefw.jpg[/img]

item.title: InnovationX source problem
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

I lol at people using my half a year old server

Remove the server VM tag.

“-server”

Okay, now your heap is too large for your computer. We had 16GB RAM, and 12 cores.

Change all “12024” to something hell smaller like “512” (it’s the heap size)

Read full topic
